description: A heavy helmet that provides excellent protection from all sorts of damage.  It is labeled as the advanced combat helmet. It is emblazoned with the blue globe logo of the UN. A coveted prize amongst certain survivalist types.

A bullet-resistant vest used by UN security forces deployed to the New England Exlcusion zone by various obscure benefactors. Although not the best ballistic protection, it is more than sufficient for most of the hazards of the Exclusion Zone.
